'''2.1.12466''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), '''2.1.12465''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), or '''2.1.12464''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on March 2, 2020.

== Fixes ==
{{bug|MCL-13157}} & {{bug|MCL-13207}}: Attempt to mitigate issues with Xorg errors
